channel.title: Creation on Silence Speaks
channel.description: Recent content in Creation on Silence Speaks

item.title: Booming Voice
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: Silent explosions amidst the stars. Booming voices that created Mars. Yet Earth only his finger is placed And filled it with creatures the devil faced. All of creation has now withered Thanks to the one who now slithers. But a complex plan has been made, And ages later death is slayed. God is never seen yet is all-seeing Of all the actions of human beings. His guiding voice amidst speeding cars
